title: Role of non-coding sequence variants in cancer

tldr.text: The current understanding of non-coding variants in cancer is reviewed, including the great diversity of the mutation types — from single nucleotide variants to large genomic rearrangements — and the wide range of mechanisms by which they affect gene expression to promote tumorigenesis.
